contentList.content: You are the pinnacle of vampire-kind and, as such, are <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to Cold and Necrotic damage as well as the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="EXHAUSTED">Exhausted</LSTag> conditions.

You can perceive your surroundings without relying on sight within [1]. You are able to detect <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> creatures, ignores darkness penalties, and don't suffer the disadvantages to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag>.

Affected entity can perceive their surroundings without relying on sight within [1] and are able to detect <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> creatures, ignores darkness penalties, and ignore the disadvantages to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag>.
